en.reduce_capacity_warning: Reduce capacity can cause data loss!
en.sure_to_clear_snapshot: Are you sure you want to clear all snapshots on volume {0}?
en.sure_to_delete_volume: Are you sure you want to delete volume {0}?
en.sure_to_delete_volume_tip: There are snapshots on the volume, you need to clear the snapshots first!
en.sure_to_clear_snapshot_tip: Make sure that all the snapshots of the {0} storage volume are not protected, and all the snapshots of the volume of this volume after cleaning will be deleted.
en.sure_to_reduce_capacity: Are you sure to reduce the volume to {0} GB ? Reduce capacity will cause data loss, Please enter the volume name to confirm.
en.volume_info: Block storage volume is a logical entity storing data directly by user center applications, providing block device level elastic storage function. A volume can only belong to a storage.

zh-CN.sure_to_clear_snapshot: 确定删除{0}块存储卷的所有快照?
zh-CN.sure_to_delete_volume_tip: 卷里有快照，需先清除快照。
zh-CN.sure_to_clear_snapshot_tip: 请确保，{0}存储卷的所有快照都未被保护，清除后所有此块存储卷的所有快照都会被删除。
zh-CN.sure_to_flatten_volume: 确认断开 {0} 块存储卷与其父快照的关系链?
zh-CN.sure_to_reduce_capacity: 是否确认缩容块存储卷为 {0} GB,缩容会导致数据丢失，请输入卷名称以确认。
zh-CN.volume_info: 块存储卷是用户中心应用直接存储数据的逻辑实体，提供块设备级的弹性存储功能，一个卷只能属于一个存储。
